title: 15th August Celebration with Rainbow Shelter Home.
paras: Keeping the flag high today our team in partner with Those in Need organization had celebrated Virtual Independence Day with kids from Rainbow Homes Program.
Those in need team engaged the kids with activities like flag hoisting, singing, dancing, etc. Our team has sent food boxes and some items that the shelter homes need for children.
We thank all the stakeholders and people who were tirelessly involved in making it successful.
